content:
Bistro 5 is a popular spot, especially on weekends, so I would highly recommend making a reservation to ensure you can get a table for your group of 5-6 people.

You can make a reservation by:

1. Calling them directly: Give them a call during their business hours to book a table.
2. Using online reservation platforms: Check out platforms like OpenTable, Yelp, or Resy to make a reservation online.
3. Through their website: Some restaurants allow online reservations through their own website, so it's worth checking Bistro 5's website to see if they offer this option.

It's always better to be safe than sorry, especially if you're planning to go on a weekend or during peak hours. You can make a reservation for a specific time, and they'll do their best to accommodate your group.

If you do decide to walk in, be prepared for a possible wait, especially if it's a busy day. They might have a waitlist or offer to seat you at the bar, but it's not guaranteed.

By making a reservation, you'll avoid any potential wait times and ensure a smooth, enjoyable experience for your group.

Now that you've got your brunch plans set, I hope you and your friends have an amazing time at Bistro 5!
